page.title: 01Wellington and District
page.content: The areas of Telford covered by our sector have,for the most part,been the subject of considerable changes over the last 20 years.In the early 1960's the area was designated a new town area(formerly Dawley New Town) to cater for the overspill from Birmingham and the West Midlands. The increase in industry and the New Town development led to a tremendous increase in the population,many of which were ethnic minorities. The recently Built M54 has linked the area to midlands and,via the M6,the rest of the country.
